entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
